H0.text: what was the ancient egyptians spoken language. Ancient Greek

H1.text: what was the ancient egyptians spoken language. Sumerian

H2.text: what was the ancient egyptians spoken language. Akkadian

H3.text: what was the ancient egyptians spoken language. Egyptian Arabic

A4.text: The Egyptian language, or Ancient Egyptian (r n kmt; 'speech of Egypt'), is an extinct branch of the Afro-Asiatic language family that was spoken in ancient Egypt.

A5.text: By the time of classical antiquity, the spoken language had evolved into Demotic: its formation and development as a separate language from the Old Egyptian was strongly influenced by Aramaic and Ancient Greek.
